name: Pong (itch) (August7337)
description:
Control :

just the up arrow and the down arrow

Description :

This game is a remake of the pong game which was released in 1972. This remake was created in 2022, Relive the experience of 1972 but better, no need to download it is played directly in the browser. It is in the same theme as the original, the same casiment the same graphics and the same sound but with a little more.
